title: The Calabash of Culture
description: Formerly known as Honey Hive Cafe, this is a pop-up turned permanent cafe at the back of Calabash of Culture shop which sells global arts, crafts, books, jewelry, and musical instruments. The cafe expanded, re-named, and became all vegan in 2015 as the the shop reduced in size. Serves salads, warm food, juice, smoothie, herbal teas, and take-out. On Friday a 3-course meal from 6:30-9pm is possible with advanced reservation.
